name: US Citizenship and Immigration Services
description: U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) is the federal agency that oversees lawful immigration to the United States. We are a component of the Department of Homeland Security. Some of the services we provide include: - Citizenship (Includes the Related Naturalization Process) - Immigration of Family Members - Working in the U.S. - Verifying an Individual’s Legal Right to Work in the United States (E-Verify) - Humanitarian Programs - Adoptions - Civic Assimilation - Genealogy
